main event: Three military officers observed a metallic, circular object that moved at a high rate of speed and changed direction sharply over George Air Force Base in California.
interesting points: The object appeared circular in shape and smooth on the edges.
The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes.
No sound was heard and no vapor trails were visible.
The observers were high-ranking military officers: Colonel J.A. Coleman, Lt. Col. J.L. Thomas, and Capt. R.L. Burgess.
The weather conditions were clear with mild winds.
witnesses: Colonel J.A. Coleman, Lt. Col. J.L. Thomas, and Capt. R.L. Burgess
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph
